text: Cool thread! On the footnote on optimal matrix accumulation order in O(n^3) I thought of "Optimal Jacobian accumulation is NP-complete". If I understood correctly the simpler matrix chain problem assumes that the factors don't have any internal structure / are just dense - i.e. a contrast to AD?
